contest-event.event-date:
April 28, 1951 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Macbeth [D. Rimmer]
Victoria Park, Holmfirth March contest - 1st Meltham, 2nd Hinchliffe Mill. Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £15 and shield, 3rd £10, 4th £6, 5th £4. 14 bands competed.
April 4, 2012, 9 p.m. April 27, 2020, 9:54 a.m.
1 Hepworth Band George Kaye

3 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Willie Kaye
4 Brodsworth Colliery Band Jack Boddice
5 Stocksbridge Works James Thompson
